title.narrative: Youth Leader Exchange in Relation to IMCC Nepal and PSRN-sc?s Partnership Project on SRH(R) and Mental Health for adolescents in Nepal

description.narrative: The Youth Leaders (YLs) will be attached to the partnership project between IMCC Nepal and PSRN-sc on Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights (SRHR) and mental health The purpose of the Youth Leader exchange (YLE) is to support the project objectives and activities, and to strengthen the capacity and communication within the partnership The YLs will have a special focus on educating members of PSRN in different workshops, and an ongoing evaluation of how the project is going in the ?new? project-district; Tanahun, where our teaching, empowerment and advocacy work will focus on students from grades 7, 8, 9 and 11 The YLs (two from each organization) will work for 3 months during the two year project The implementation of Youth Leaders will serve as an important support function in the project targeting adolescents in a rural district of Nepal
